name: .GB1 File Extension
summary: Learn about .GB1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Backup of a game project created with GameMaker, a game development program; created in case the original project file becomes corrupted or is accidentally deleted.

content: The number of backup files created by GameMaker can be selected by opening the Preferences within the GameMaker program and selecting the "General" tab. Then type the number of backups you would like saved next to "Maximal number of backups."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
